resources.string: I love you very much and I always will. Just thought you should know that as you are playing with your tablet.
Shapes are really fun. They include circles, squares and rectangles. You can see them all around you in real life if you just look.
I was just thinking about how I love macaroni and cheese. Not that nasty whole wheat butternut squash thing, the good stuff, right out of the blue box. Day-glo orange. Oh yeah.
Math is for everybody. Math is everywhere. Math is near you. Math is over there.
